   106	class ModelRunner:
   107	    """ModelRunner runs the forward passes of the models."""
   108	
   109	    def __init__(
   110	        self,
   111	        model_config: ModelConfig,
   112	        mem_fraction_static: float,
   113	        gpu_id: int,
   114	        tp_rank: int,
   115	        tp_size: int,
   116	        pp_rank: int,
   117	        pp_size: int,
   118	        nccl_port: int,
   119	        server_args: ServerArgs,
   120	        is_draft_worker: bool = False,
   121	        req_to_token_pool: Optional[ReqToTokenPool] = None,
   122	        token_to_kv_pool_allocator: Optional[TokenToKVPoolAllocator] = None,
   123	    ):
   124	        # Parse args
   125	        self.model_config = model_config
   126	        self.mem_fraction_static = mem_fraction_static
   127	        self.device = server_args.device
   128	        self.gpu_id = gpu_id
   129	        self.tp_rank = tp_rank
   130	        self.tp_size = tp_size
   131	        self.pp_rank = pp_rank
   132	        self.pp_size = pp_size
   133	        self.dist_port = nccl_port
   134	        self.server_args = server_args
   135	        self.is_draft_worker = is_draft_worker
   136	        self.is_generation = model_config.is_generation
   137	        self.is_multimodal = model_config.is_multimodal
   138	        self.should_log = tp_rank == 0
   139	        self.spec_algorithm = SpeculativeAlgorithm.from_string(
   140	            server_args.speculative_algorithm
   141	        )
   142	        self.page_size = server_args.page_size
   143	        self.req_to_token_pool = req_to_token_pool
   144	        self.token_to_kv_pool_allocator = token_to_kv_pool_allocator
   145	        self.use_mla_backend = self.model_config.attention_arch == AttentionArch.MLA
   146	        self.attention_chunk_size = model_config.attention_chunk_size
   147	
   148	        # Model-specific adjustment
   149	        self.model_specific_adjustment()
   150	
   151	        if server_args.show_time_cost:
   152	            enable_show_time_cost()
   153	
   154	        # Global vars
   155	        global_server_args_dict.update(
   156	            {
   157	                "attention_backend": server_args.attention_backend,
   158	                "debug_tensor_dump_inject": server_args.debug_tensor_dump_inject,
   159	                "debug_tensor_dump_output_folder": server_args.debug_tensor_dump_output_folder,
   160	                "deepep_mode": server_args.deepep_mode,
   161	                "device": server_args.device,
   162	                "disable_chunked_prefix_cache": server_args.disable_chunked_prefix_cache,
   163	                "disable_radix_cache": server_args.disable_radix_cache,
   164	                "enable_nan_detection": server_args.enable_nan_detection,
   165	                "enable_dp_attention": server_args.enable_dp_attention,
   166	                "enable_ep_moe": server_args.enable_ep_moe,
   167	                "enable_deepep_moe": server_args.enable_deepep_moe,
   168	                "flashinfer_mla_disable_ragged": server_args.flashinfer_mla_disable_ragged,
   169	                "moe_dense_tp_size": server_args.moe_dense_tp_size,
   170	                "n_share_experts_fusion": server_args.n_share_experts_fusion,
   171	                "triton_attention_reduce_in_fp32": server_args.triton_attention_reduce_in_fp32,
   172	                "torchao_config": server_args.torchao_config,
   173	                "sampling_backend": server_args.sampling_backend,
   174	                "speculative_accept_threshold_single": server_args.speculative_accept_threshold_single,
   175	                "speculative_accept_threshold_acc": server_args.speculative_accept_threshold_acc,
   176	                "use_mla_backend": self.use_mla_backend,
   177	                "mm_attention_backend": server_args.mm_attention_backend,
   178	            }
   179	        )
   180	
   181	        # CPU offload
   182	        set_cpu_offload_max_bytes(int(server_args.cpu_offload_gb * 1024**3))
   183	
   184	        # Get memory before model loading
   185	        min_per_gpu_memory = self.init_torch_distributed()
   186	
   187	        # Update deep gemm configure
   188	        if _ENABLE_JIT_DEEPGEMM:
   189	            update_deep_gemm_config(gpu_id, server_args)
   190	
   191	        # If it is a draft model, tp_group can be different
   192	        self.initialize(min_per_gpu_memory)
   193	
   194	        # temporary cached values
   195	        self.support_pp = (
   196	            "pp_proxy_tensors" in inspect.signature(self.model.forward).parameters
   197	        )
   198	
   199	    def initialize(self, min_per_gpu_memory: float):
   200	        server_args = self.server_args
   201	        self.memory_saver_adapter = TorchMemorySaverAdapter.create(
   202	            enable=self.server_args.enable_memory_saver
   203	        )
   204	
   205	        # Load the model
   206	        self.sampler = Sampler()
   207	        self.load_model()
   208	
   209	        self.start_layer = getattr(self.model, "start_layer", 0)
   210	        self.end_layer = getattr(
   211	            self.model, "end_layer", self.model_config.num_hidden_layers
   212	        )
   213	        self.num_effective_layers = self.end_layer - self.start_layer
   214	
   215	        # Apply torchao quantization
   216	        torchao_applied = getattr(self.model, "torchao_applied", False)
   217	        # In layered loading, torchao may have been applied
   218	        if not torchao_applied:
   219	            apply_torchao_config_to_model(
   220	                self.model, global_server_args_dict["torchao_config"]
   221	            )
   222	
   223	        # Apply torch TP if the model supports it
   224	        supports_torch_tp = getattr(self.model, "supports_torch_tp", False)
   225	        if self.tp_size > 1 and supports_torch_tp:
   226	            self.apply_torch_tp()
   227	
   228	        # Init lora
   229	        if server_args.lora_paths is not None:
   230	            self.init_lora_manager()
   231	
   232	        # Init memory pool and attention backends
   233	        self.init_memory_pool(
   234	            min_per_gpu_memory,
   235	            server_args.max_running_requests,
   236	            server_args.max_total_tokens,
   237	        )
   238	        if self.device == "cuda":
   239	            self.init_cublas()
   240	            self.init_attention_backend()

arguments.file_text:
import time
import torch

# Use the sglang implementation of moe_align_block_size
from sglang.srt.layers.moe.fused_moe_triton.fused_moe import moe_align_block_size


def bench_once(num_tokens=4096, num_experts=64, topk=2, block_size=128):
    device = 'cuda'
    # Generate input
    topk_ids = torch.randint(0, num_experts, (num_tokens, topk), dtype=torch.int32, device=device)

    # Warmup
    for _ in range(3):
        torch.cuda.synchronize()
        moe_align_block_size(topk_ids, block_size, num_experts)
        torch.cuda.synchronize()

    torch.cuda.synchronize()
    start = time.time()
    sorted_ids, expert_ids, num_tokens_post_pad = moe_align_block_size(topk_ids, block_size, num_experts)
    torch.cuda.synchronize()
    dur = time.time() - start
    return dur, sorted_ids, expert_ids, num_tokens_post_pad


def main():
    torch.manual_seed(0)
    # Measure several iterations
    iters = 5
    times = []
    for _ in range(iters):
        t, *_ = bench_once()
        times.append(t)
    print(f"moe_align_block_size avg over {iters}: {sum(times)/len(times):.6f} s; details: {[round(x,6) for x in times]}")


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

    sys.path.insert(0, PY_PATH)

        moe_align_block_size(topk_ids, block_size, num_experts)
        torch.cuda.synchronize()

    torch.cuda.synchronize()
    start = time.time()
    sorted_ids, expert_ids, num_tokens_post_pad = moe_align_block_size(topk_ids, block_size, num_experts)

    dur = time.time() - start
    return dur, sorted_ids, expert_ids, num_tokens_post_pad


def main():
    torch.manual_seed(0)

        times.append(t)

arguments.new_str:
import time
import torch
import os
import sys

# Ensure modules are importable from repo root
REPO_ROOT = os.path.abspath(os.path.join(os.path.dirname(__file__), os.pardir))
PY_PATH = os.path.join(REPO_ROOT, 'python')
SGL_KERNEL_PY = os.path.join(REPO_ROOT, 'sgl-kernel', 'python')
for p in (PY_PATH, SGL_KERNEL_PY):
    if p not in sys.path:
        sys.path.insert(0, p)

# Prefer the low-level sgl_kernel binding to avoid importing full sglang stack
from sgl_kernel import moe_align_block_size


def bench_once(num_tokens=4096, num_experts=64, topk=2, block_size=128):
    device = 'cuda'
    # Generate input (flattened as kernel expects 1D for topk_ids)
    topk_ids = torch.randint(0, num_experts, (num_tokens * topk,), dtype=torch.int32, device=device)

    # Output buffers
    max_num_tokens_padded = topk_ids.numel() + num_experts * (block_size - 1)
    sorted_ids = torch.empty((max_num_tokens_padded,), dtype=torch.int32, device=device)
    expert_ids = torch.empty(( (max_num_tokens_padded + block_size - 1)//block_size,), dtype=torch.int32, device=device)
    num_tokens_post_pad = torch.empty((1,), dtype=torch.int32, device=device)
    token_cnts_buffer = torch.empty(((num_experts + 1) * num_experts,), dtype=torch.int32, device=device)
    cumsum_buffer = torch.empty((num_experts + 1,), dtype=torch.int32, device=device)

    # Warmup
    for _ in range(3):
        torch.cuda.synchronize()
        moe_align_block_size(topk_ids, num_experts, block_size, sorted_ids, expert_ids, num_tokens_post_pad, token_cnts_buffer, cumsum_buffer)
        torch.cuda.synchronize()

    torch.cuda.synchronize()
    start = time.time()
    moe_align_block_size(topk_ids, num_experts, block_size, sorted_ids, expert_ids, num_tokens_post_pad, token_cnts_buffer, cumsum_buffer)
    torch.cuda.synchronize()
    dur = time.time() - start
    return dur


def main():
    torch.manual_seed(0)
    # Measure several iterations
    iters = 5
    times = []
    for _ in range(iters):
        t = bench_once()
        times.append(t)
    print(f"sgl_kernel.moe_align_block_size avg over {iters}: {sum(times)/len(times):.6f} s; details: {[round(x,6) for x in times]}")


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

    torch.cuda.synchronize()
    start = time.time()
    sorted_ids, expert_ids, num_tokens_post_pad = moe_align_block_size(topk_ids, block_size, num_experts)
    torch.cuda.synchronize()
    dur = time.time() - start
    return dur, sorted_ids, expert_ids, num_tokens_post_pad


def main():
    torch.manual_seed(0)
    # Measure several iterations
    iters = 5
    times = []
    for _ in range(iters):
        t, *_ = bench_once()
        times.append(t)
    print(f"moe_align_block_size avg over {iters}: {sum(times)/len(times):.6f} s; details: {[round(x,6) for x in times]}")


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

tool_result.result:
num_token = scores.shape[0]
    num_experts = scores.shape[1]
    group_scores = (
        scores.view(num_token, num_expert_group, -1).max(dim=-1).values
    )  # [n, n_group]
    group_idx = torch.topk(group_scores, k=topk_group, dim=-1, sorted=False)[
        1
    ]  # [n, top_k_group]
    group_mask = torch.zeros_like(group_scores)  # [n, n_group]
    group_mask.scatter_(1, group_idx, 1)  # [n, n_group]
    score_mask = (
        group_mask.unsqueeze(-1)
        .expand(num_token, num_expert_group, scores.shape[-1] // num_expert_group)
        .reshape(num_token, -1)
    )  # [n, e]
    tmp_scores = scores.masked_fill(~score_mask.bool(), 0.0)  # [n, e]
    topk_weights, topk_ids = torch.topk(tmp_scores, k=topk, dim=-1, sorted=False)
    if n_share_experts_fusion:
        topk_ids[:, -1] = torch.randint(
            low=num_experts,
            high=num_experts + n_share_experts_fusion,
            size=(topk_ids.size(0),),
            dtype=topk_ids.dtype,
            device=topk_ids.device,
        )
        topk_weights[:, -1] = topk_weights[:, :-1].sum(dim=-1) / routed_scaling_factor

    if renormalize:
        topk_weights_sum = (
            topk_weights.sum(dim=-1, keepdim=True)
            if n_share_experts_fusion == 0
            else topk_weights[:, :-1].sum(dim=-1, keepdim=True)
        )
        topk_weights = topk_weights / topk_weights_sum

    return topk_weights.to(torch.float32), topk_ids.to(torch.int32)
